Text: OC Transpo Route 97 is the City of Ottawa bus (transitway) between downtown and the airport.
Triplets:<OC Transpo Route 97
1:
--------------------
<Text: OC Transpo Route 97: It starts at Bayshore Station at Bayshore Shopping Centre and ends at either South Keys Station or the Airport.>
Triplets:<OC Transpo Route 97
2:
--------------------
<Text: OC Transpo Route 97:  Several trips each day start or end at Tunney's Pasture Station.>
Triplets:<OC Transpo Route 97
3:
--------------------
<Text: OC Transpo Route 97: Some trips also serve Bells Corners after serving Bayshore Station.>
Triplets:<OC Transpo Route 97
